name: The Astronaut
description:
Ready for takeoff. 

Made from a soft cotton blend.
**Please indicate at checkout whether you'd like "Dark Gray" or "Light Gray" color. 

Care Instructions: Hand wash cool. Lay flat to dry.

This item is made on order. Please allow 7-10 days for items to ship. 
Questions about sizing? Click on the link at the bottom of the homepage for more info.

Interested in a custom hat? Contact emily@pennyandpaulgoods.com for more information. Prices vary based on sizing, material, color changes and add-ons such as pompoms. We'll see what we can do!

Don't forget- we have more inventory not listed on the website. If you'd like a hat that is ready to ship on purchase, please contact us to see your choices or to arrange a time to come view our current inventory. If you're local and want to save on shipping, email us to arrange a pick-up. Thanks!

name: CUSTOM Bootie Order
description:
Order a pair of custom made kicks!
Want more? Add them to a hat purchase for $45 total.

Attach a picture of a style you like or just write a description of what you are looking for.  We'll get back to you with the details. 

The pictures shown here have already been sold and are just samples of booties you could order.

Please include:
Size (or age of baby if you don't know it).  
Upper Color
Sole Color
Style: Slip-on or strap (this will be sewn down, not adjustable)
Detail: Trim color or flower if desired

Bootie Standard Sizing
Newborn-3 Months: fits foot up to 3.5 inches
3-6 months: fits foot up to 4 inches
6-9 months: fits foot up to 4.5 inches
9-12 months: fits foot up to 5 inches 
(**sizes larger than 12 months are not available)
